name: Piedmont Lithium Inc.
description: Piedmont Lithium Inc. is a leading developer of lithium resources in the United States, focusing on the production of lithium hydroxide to support the booming electric vehicle (EV) market. Founded in 2016 and headquartered in Belmont, North Carolina, Piedmont aims to become a key player in the lithium supply chain by developing its lithium project in North Carolina, which is strategically located near major battery and EV manufacturers. The company's flagship project is the Piedmont Lithium Project, which is projected to be one of the largest lithium hydroxide operations in North America. With a strong commitment to sustainable practices, Piedmont utilizes environmentally friendly methods in its mining and processing operations. As the demand for lithium continues to rise due to the electrification of transportation and renewable energy storage, Piedmont is well-positioned to meet this demand while contributing to a sustainable future. The company is also dedicated to establishing strategic partnerships within the EV supply chain to ensure a reliable supply of lithium for domestic and international markets.
